HomePage.Hero1Subtitle: As one of the leading business hubs in the region we set an example for best practice in trade, design and service. We are a diversified group of companies with eight independent business units with our corporate office in Dubai.
HomePage.Hero2Subtitle:
Designing and installing Pumping Systems
Our engineering division has been designing and installing pumping systems since 1935.

Process.Heading: Our Process
Process.Step1Description: We begin by listening carefully to our customers and stakeholders, identifying their unique requirements and challenges. This ensures every solution is tailored to deliver maximum impact.
Process.Step2Description: Our experts craft innovative, eco-friendly, and cost-effective solutions that balance performance with environmental responsibility. Sustainability is embedded in every stage of our process.
Process.Step3Description: From planning to execution, we apply advanced technologies and industry best practices to deliver reliable, high-quality outcomes. Precision and efficiency guide every project we undertake.
Process.Step4Description: We don't stop at delivery. Ongoing monitoring, feedback, and support help us refine our solutions, ensuring long-term value and exceeding stakeholder expectations.

Partners.Heading: Our Partners
Partners.Description: We work only with the best to bring you only the best.

EnterpriseSections.Section1Subtitle: Deliver a triple play of results: happier customers, employees and shareholders
EnterpriseSections.Section2Subtitle: Accelerate your organization’s results through your people and teams
EnterpriseSections.Section3Subtitle: Deliver a triple play of results: happier customers, employees and shareholders

BusinessSteps.Heading: To Get Successful Business, Follow These Steps
BusinessSteps.Step1Description: Drive growth responsibly by adopting eco-friendly practices that protect resources and support a cleaner future.
BusinessSteps.Step2Description: Drive growth through innovation, advanced technology, and smart diversification while adapting to evolving market demands.
BusinessSteps.Step3Description: Consistently deliver excellence to earn trust and build lasting relationships.
BusinessSteps.Text: Stay ahead in a rapidly changing world.

WhyUs.Heading: Why you should choose us?
WhyUs.Description: We combine innovation, sustainability, and trusted partnerships to deliver solutions that are efficient, reliable, and built for long-term value.
WhyUs.Item1Content: From water pumping to recycling, our products are designed to protect the environment while delivering unmatched performance and efficiency.
WhyUs.Item2Content: We collaborate with world-class brands like Grundfos to bring cutting-edge technology tailored to regional needs.
WhyUs.Item3Content: Our dedicated after-sales team ensures smooth installation, prompt maintenance, and long-term peace of mind - every step of the way.

AboutUsPage.Heading: About Us
AboutUsPage.Description: The M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group is one of the UAE’s most trusted business groups, delivering world-class technological solutions across diverse industries. Headquartered in Dubai, the group employs over 3,100 professionals from 30 nationalities, operates 17 offices across the UAE, and serves clients in more than 29 countries across the Middle East, the Levant, and Africa.

MissionStatement.Heading: Mission Statement
MissionStatement.Text: To provide high-quality pumping products and engineered solutions through trusted partnerships, continuous innovation, and exceptional service, creating long-term value for our customers, stakeholders, and communities.

Purpose.Heading: Our Purpose
Purpose.Item1Text: To deliver innovative, sustainable solutions that create long-term value for our partners, communities, and the markets we serve. We are committed to combining expertise, technology, and responsible practices to address real-world challenges while driving measurable impact. Through continuous improvement and collaboration, we aim to build resilient businesses that contribute positively to economic and social development.
Purpose.Item2Text: To be a trusted regional leader, shaping the future through smart investments, innovation, and responsible growth. We envision a future where our initiatives set new benchmarks for excellence, adaptability, and sustainability across industries. By anticipating change and embracing progress, we strive to create lasting value for generations to come.
Purpose.Item3Text: Integrity, collaboration, and excellence guide everything we do, ensuring accountability, transparency, and lasting impact. We believe in building strong relationships based on trust, mutual respect, and shared goals. Our values drive ethical decision-making, foster teamwork, and inspire us to consistently deliver high-quality outcomes in all our endeavors.
Purpose.Text1: At M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group, our purpose is to deliver solutions that enrich lives while protecting the planet.
Purpose.Text2: We combine innovation, sustainability, and technology to create cost-effective products and services that empower communities, drive progress, and safeguard the environment for future generations.

History.Heading: Our History
History.Text: We're proud of our UAE heritage. From our beginnings in 1972 as a local port operator in Dubai to a global logistics provider with operations in over 69 countries and across every continent.

OurPeople.Heading: Our People
OurPeople.Text: Our dedicated team of more than 100,000 employees from over 150 nationalities ensure the smooth flow of trade. As an equal employer that recognises and values diversity and an inclusive culture, we empower and up-skill our people with opportunities to perform at their best.

Leaders.Heading: From The Leaders
Leaders.Text1: Our people are our greatest strength and the driving force behind our shared vision of making trade flow.
Leaders.Position1: Chairman of M.A.H.Y. Khoory & Co. LLC
Leaders.Text2: Our people are our greatest strength and the driving force behind our shared vision of making trade flow.

CompaniesPage.Heading: Our Portfolio
CompaniesPage.Description: The Fund seeks to build a rich investment portfolio of companies across diverse sectors in UAE and beyond, in line with UAE Vision.
